thread.title: Vulcun Takes The Lead In Fantasy eSports
thread.title_full: Vulcun Takes The Lead In Fantasy eSports

author: Mike Ozanian
title: Vulcun Takes The Lead In Fantasy eSports
text: [caption id="attachment_0a0ae5fcfb8146a8ab02e727e440df90" align="" width="640"] FILE - In this May 11, 2014 file photo, fans watch the opening ceremony of the League of Legends season 4 World Championship Final between South Korea against China's Royal Club, in Paris. (AP Photo/Jacques Brinon, File)[/caption]eSPorts tournaments, where contestants play video games like League of Legends for big prize money, have become a hot commodity in recent years. So why not fantasy contests for gaming spectators? Vulcun co-founder Ali Moiz, an entrepreneur with a successful track record and a former video gamer, explains his company's strategy and the prospects for fantasy eSports on the current episode of Forbes SportsMoney .[brightcove videoID=4524694308001]
